name: Exorcism Teens Demo
description:
Controls:

Space: Select and Use Action
UP and DOWN arrows: Select Action
LEFT and RIGHT arrows: Spin

Credits:

Battle Music: Falling into the game from You know where to find me by Soft and Furious
At Home Music: Cigar from TRG Banks by TRG Banks
Home Background from the Modern Background Set by Konett (Angel Wareman)
Visual Novel Sprites by Red Chan
Floor Tiles by Darby Machin
Top Down Sprites by Kenney Game Assets

Please let me know how you find my demo!
